entries.cant_work: Report here after you've completed your current assignment.
entries.dontknowyou_1: You're in the wrong place, friend. No supplies available today.
entries.notyet: I can't speak with you right now, I'm on duty.
entries.npc_1_1: Medics at an independent supply depot were seen to issue supplies to a known Rebel. We want you to blow up the depot.
entries.npc_1_2: We've located a Rebel transmission relay. Seems to be hidden in a lair of klikniks, some kind of native bugs. Destroy the lair and that should take out the transmitter.
entries.npc_2_1: Report back here when the depot is gone.
entries.npc_2_2: Right. Report back when you've destroyed the bug lair.
entries.npc_3_2: Don't want to crush a few bugs? Well, check back if you change your mind.
entries.npc_4_1: They're probably all Rebel sympathizers, so they deserve to die. Do you want the job or not?
entries.npc_4_2: Saves time. Bugs are bugs. Do you want the job or not?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: That's all the info I have. Destroy the medical supply depot.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: That's all the information I have. Destroy the kliknik lair.
entries.npc_failure_1: Didn't destroy that medical supply depot? We'll find someone who can.
entries.npc_failure_2: Didn't destroy that kliknik lair? Well, we'll find someone who can.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I'm waiting on coordinates for the medical supply depot. Report back here in a few moments.
entries.npc_noloc_2: I'm waiting on coordinates for the kliknik lair. Check with me in a few moments.
entries.npc_reset_1: No stomach for facing a medical supply depot? Not much of a soldier.
entries.npc_reward_1: Good. Report back if you want another assignment.
entries.npc_reward_2: Good job. That's all for now.
entries.npc_work_1: You need to destroy that medical supply depot.
entries.npc_work_2: You're supposed to destroy that kliknik lair with the hidden Rebel transmitter.
entries.player_3_1: Destroying a medical supply depot because it helped one Rebel? Isn't that overkill?
entries.player_3_2: Why destroy a whole lair of innocent creatures instead of just the transmitter?
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: This stormtrooper sergeant awaits news of the destruction of the medical supply depot that issued supplies to a Rebel.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: This stormtrooper sergeant awaits news of the destruction of the "Rebel" kliknik lair.
entries.waypoint_description_1: Stormtrooper sergeant CX-425 wants this independent depot blown up because it provided supplies to a Rebel.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Stormtrooper sergeant CX-425 believes this lair of klikniks harbors a hidden Rebel transmitter.
entries.npc_reset_2: No stomach for facing a medical supply depot? Not much of a soldier.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
